comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of mango bubble teas made
- y: number of lychee bubble teas made

Extracted Constraints:
- Mango Juice: 4x \leq 2000
- Lychee Juice: 6y \leq 3000
- Tea Constraint: 8x + 6y \leq T
- Minimum Lychee Percentage: y \geq 0.4(x+y)
- Mango Tea Sales: x \geq y

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize T (total amount of tea needed): Minimize T = 8x + 6y
